segments.text: I see the water just keeps flowing out of the sink, creating a bigger and bigger puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet, it's right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet and sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the cookie jar, standing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, and that makes me very nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched and a big smile on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess with the cookies or slip on the wet floor and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to be surprised when she sees the puddle and the kids with cookies, and I think she might be angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might slip and fall, and that would be terrible and very painful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for disaster if they're not careful and something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
